śāṃta ākāram caṃtur hastam śroṇā nakṣatra vallabham
viṣṇum kamala pattra akṣam dhyāyet garuḍa vāhanam
nīla megha śyāmaḥ viṣṇuḥ devatā
nakṣatracūḍāmaṇau
kuryāt homaṃyajña dīkṣāḥ caula moṃjī vidhānam
garbhādhānam karṇavedham prayāṇam viṣṇoḥ dhiṣṇye devatā supratiṣṭhām

original: śroṇāhāratrayam || śī śu śe śo śravaṇam | kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ | dhanurākṛtiḥ | pumān | devagaṇaḥ | vānarayoniḥ | viṣṇurdevatā | brāhmaṇajātiḥ | catuṣpāt | ūrdhvamukham | sulocanam | caraḥ | aṃtarbāhyam | pattanam | sthānm | iṃdramaṃḍalam | ṭokṣaraḥ | samatārā | arkavṛkṣaḥ | pakṣīsārasaḥ || asminnakṣatre aṃgārakavibhīṣaṇau jātau | daśaghaṭikābhyaḥ paraṃviṣanāḍyaścatasraḥ | śālipiṣṭaṃbhakṣayitvādakṣiṇapaścimaprayāṇeśubham | jvare ekādaśadinānyariṣṭāni || - || tacchāṃtyaiviṣṇupūjāvidhānam | kṛṣṇavastram | caṃdanakastūrīkarpūrakuṃkumagaṃdhaḥ | tulasīpuṣpam | daśāṃgadhūpaḥ | śālyodananaivedyam | atodevā itimantreṇa idaṃviṣṇuritimaṃtreṇavāṣoḍaśopacāraissaṃpūjya aśvatthasamittaṃḍulājyenagāyatryā aṣṭottaraśataṃ juhuyāt | gaṃdhamālyaiḥ kṣīraudanabaliṃ haret | ekādaśāhātsukhī bhavati || - || asminnakṣatreprathamarajasvalābhāgyaputravatī bhavati || - || asminnakṣatre ṛtupuṃsavanasīmaṃtanāmakaraṇānnaprāśanakarṇavedhacaulopanayana-kṣaurābhyaṃjanākṣaragrahaṇavedaśāstrābhyāsanavavastrabhūṣaṇamauktikāraṃbharājābhiṣekapūrṇamāsādigrahapraveśavaiṣṇavadevatāsthāpanayajñopadeśa-śāṃtikapauṣṭikamahotsavamaṃtrābhyāsakṛṣiprāraṃbhabījāvāpanabhaiṣajyādīni-praśastāni || - || asminnakṣatre jātaguṇāḥ - kṛṣṇāṃgaḥ | puṣṭimān | citrāṃbaragaṃḥ | dhapriyaḥ | parasatīratipriyaḥ | udāraśīlaḥ | baṃdhujanarataḥ | bahuvyayakaraḥ | subhagaḥ | vācakaḥ | durmaṃtrī | gulmādirogī | videśavāsī | capalaḥ | maṃtravādī | prabhuḥ | guhyadeśematsyāṃkitaḥ || navativarṣāṇiparamāyurityādikaṃ sarvamasmingraṃthedraṣṭavyam || 1 ||
analyzed: śroṇa āhāra trayam śī śu śe śo śravaṇam kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ dhanuḥ ākṛtiḥ pumān deva gaṇaḥ vānara yoniḥ viṣṇuḥ devatā brāhmaṇa jātiḥ catuṣpād ūrdhvamukham sulocanam caraḥ antar bāhyam pattanam iṃdra maṃḍalam ṭokṣaraḥ samatārā arkavṛkṣaḥ pakṣīsārasaḥ asmin nakṣatre aṃgāraka vibhīṣaṇau jātau daśa ghaṭikābhyaḥ param viṣanāḍyaḥ catasraḥ śāli piṣṭam bhakṣayitvā dakṣiṇa paścima prayāṇa anuprās

atha dhaniṣṭhā nakṣatrasya
śraviṣṭhā devatām vaṃ devasūn vara dhara āśritān
śaṃkha cakra aṃkita karān kirīṭa aṃkita mastakān
śveta varṇaḥ vasavaḥ devatāḥ    nakṣatracūḍāmaṇau
vidyā āgama upanayana aṃjana bheṣaja ani śveta ātapatra śayana āsana bhojanāni
ca vāsava ṛkṣe

original: dhaniṣṭhāmardalākāraṃcatasraḥ | gā gī gū ge dhaniṣṭhā | śvetavarṇaḥ | catustārā | mṛdaṃgākṛtiḥ | strī | rākṣasagaṇaḥ | siṃhīyoniḥ | vasavodevatāḥ | upajīvijātiḥ | ūrdhvamukham | aṃdhalocanam | aṃtarikṣam | sthānaṃgrāmaḥ | iṃdramaṃḍalam | śamīvṛkṣaḥ | pakṣībhramaraḥ | trya (ñira) kṣaraḥ || asminnakṣatreduṃdubhirjātaḥ | daśaghaṭikābhyaḥ paraṃviṣanāḍyaścatasraḥ | tilataṃḍulabhakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā pūrvottaraprayāṇe śubham | jvaremāsamariṣṭam || - || tacchāṃtyaivasudevatāpūjāvidhānam | śvetavastram | caṃdanagaṃdhaḥ | śatapatrapuṣpam | gugguladhūpaḥ | pāyasanaivedyam | trātāramitimaṃtreṇaṣoḍaśopacārapūjāṃkṛtvā auduṃbarasamidājyenagāyatryā aṣṭottaraśataṃjuhuyāt | gaṃdhamālyaiḥkṣīraudanabaliṃharet | māsātsukhībhavati || - || asminnakṣatreprathamarajasvalāputravatībhavati || - || asminnakṣatrestrīsaṃbhoganāmakaraṇānnaprāśanakarṇavedhacaulopanayana-tailābhyaṃgavastrābharaṇadhāraṇacaturaṃgayānāṃdolikācchatracāmara-dhāraṇadevatāsevāprāraṃbhayātrāpraveśaśāṃtikapauṣṭikamahotsavanṛtta-gītavādyakṛṣiprāraṃbhabījāvāpanagajādiśikṣākrayavikrayādīnipraśastāni || - || asminnakṣatrejātaguṇāḥ - alpaśāstrajñaḥ | tejasvī | udyogavān | sthūlatanuḥ | nṛttagītāṃganāpriyaḥ | dīnaḥ | anṛtavādī | nṛpasevakaḥ | dhātuvādī | kṛpāhīnaḥ | duṣkṛtī | uṣṇadehī | piśunaḥ | paṃcasaptativarṣāṇiparamāyurityādikaṃ sarvametadgraṃthe draṣṭavyam || 1 ||

atha śatabhiṣaj nakṣatrasya
varuṇam saṃtatam vaṃde sudhā kalaśa dhāriṇam
pāśahastam śatabhiṣaj devatām deva vaṃditam
svarṇa varṇaḥ varuṇaḥ devatā    nakṣatracūḍāmaṇau
jalāśaya udyāna kṛṣi kriyāḥ ca pravāla muktā ādika saṃgraham ca
turaṃgaśāṃtiṃjapa homa dānam kuryāt śata ṛkṣe nayana añjanāni
